channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Mask of Zorro
channel.desc: Don De la Vega sets out as the Zorro to avenge his wife's murder and find his daughter. During his mission, he is aided by his successor, Alejandro, who also has his own agenda.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Red Water
channel.desc: Aboard a rig, a group of workers are attacked by ruthless pirates. However, they must join forces when a freshwater bull shark targets them.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Hotel Mumbai
channel.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Bone Collector
channel.desc: A vicious serial killer terrorizes the city and brutally kills people. Lincoln, an exceptional detective, joins forces with his partner to solve this baffling case.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Book of Eli
channel.desc: Eli, a vagabond who wanders 30 years across the regions within North America, has to face several challenges to safeguard a book that contains the secrets to protect mankind.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Net 2.0
channel.desc: Hope, a computer systems analyst, goes to Istanbul to start a new job. Her life is turned upside down when she realises that her identity has been stolen and her bank account has been emptied.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Lawless
channel.desc: Three siblings operate an illegal moonshine business using their restaurant as a front. Things take a turn when the oldest brother, Forrest, refuses to pay a bribe to a corrupt lawman.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vincent N Roxxy
channel.desc: An unlikely romance develops between Vincent, a loner, and Roxxy, a rebel, while they are on the run to save their lives. However, their violent past seems to catch up with them wherever they go.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: China Salesman
channel.desc: A young Chinese engineer, Yan Jian, competes against a French spy in a competition that awards the right to control communications technology in Africa to the winner.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Stomp the Yard
channel.desc: After his brother is killed, a dancer moves away to study at a university. However, two rival dance fraternities on the campus recognise his talent and want him for themselves.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Matilda
channel.desc: Matilda shares a home with her parents and brother, who do not appreciate her. When her principal tortures her and a kind-hearted teacher, she uses her telekinetic powers to settle scores.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Boa vs. Python
channel.desc: A genetically altered, gigantic python escapes its confines and the FBI has to stop it. However, they pit a bio-engineered boa constrictor against it to end its terror.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Jerry Maguire
channel.desc: Sports agent Jerry Maguire tries to get back on his feet after being fired from his job. However, the only client he has is Rod Tidwell, a disgruntled football player who wants a better contract.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Urban Justice
channel.desc: Max Ballister, an honest cop, is killed in a crime-ridden neighbourhood. Soon, his grief-stricken father vows to avenge his death.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Exorcist: The Beginning
channel.desc: Priest Merrin struggles with his faith due to his troubled past. He joins an excavation project to investigate an ancient church, but things change when something sinister awakens.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Jawbreaker
channel.desc: Three popular high school girls, Courtney, Marcie and Julie, find themselves in serious trouble after Liz suffocates and dies from a jawbreaker.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Night Crew
channel.desc: A group of highly skilled bounty hunters must survive the night in a desert motel. However, soon, they realise that their captive is more than what she seems to be.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Please Stand By
channel.desc: Wendy, a young woman with autism, runs away from her caregiver and embarks on a journey of a lifetime in order to submit her manuscript to a screenwriting competition.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Who Am I
channel.desc: Following the demise of his beloved professor, Bhavataviya, a philosophy student, sets out on a quest to find the answer to the existential question of life.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vanguard
channel.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.
